events.message: I filed a claim today after my car was hit by another vehicle at the downtown intersection.
The agent informed me that my claim was categorized under Auto Accident following the details I provided.
An agent was assigned to my case to guide me through the claim process and answer any questions.
Received acknowledgment from the insurance company confirming that they have received my claim documentation.
I was asked to submit photos of the vehicle damage along with the police accident report for further review.
I promptly uploaded all requested documents including photos and the police report to the online claim portal.
The insurance company began their investigation into the accident circumstances and listed damages to my vehicle.
Investigation completed and findings were documented; coverage determination will be communicated shortly.
Received proposed settlement offer covering repair costs and rental car fees as discussed with my agent.
I submitted feedback expressing satisfaction with the communication and efficiency during the claim process.
Official notice was received approving my claim and confirming the coverage amount for vehicle repairs.
Payment was issued to my repair shop directly, enabling me to proceed with the necessary car repairs immediately.
My claim was officially closed after repairs were completed and all payments were processed successfully.
